EmailTemplate.name: 201701_Global_Email_TPE331_North America Expansion_JRD.201706_Global_Email_TPE33
EmailTemplate.subject: NEWS: TAE Expands TPE331 Support to North America
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.taeaerospace.com/]]> NEWS | TPE331 Services & Support TAE EXPANDS TPE331 SUPPORT TO NORTH AMERICA Dear Customer,
As of June 1, 2017, TAE, a heavy authorized Honeywell TPE331 service center <[[http://www.tae.com.au/]]> based out of Queensland, Australia has expanded its services to North America. TAE has teamed up with other authorized MRO service providers in the U.S., creating a highly efficient service network that can respond to customers’ needs as efficiently as a local provider.
TAE has more than 25 years of experience working with the TPE331 and currently supports customers from around the world from its state-of-the-art engine facility. Customers in North America can now take advantage of TAE's global capabilities which include:
- Engine overhaul
- Engine CAM
- Engine hot section inspections
- Prop strike inspections
- Gearbox inspections
- Fuel control repair/overhaul/exchange
- Propeller governor repair/overhaul/exchange
To speak to someone at TAE about their services in North America, please email Mario Chavez <[[mailto:Mario.Chavez@taeaviation.com.au]]>. To read the full article which covers TAE's expansion in North America, please click the link below.
READ THE FULL ARTICLE HERE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2017/june/tae-gives-tpe331-operators-new-service-and-repair-option-in-north-america]]>
